data.text: @Variety unlike material & sex contract partnership a family dissolution is the most difficult experience when two united as one in spirit.
@RemiVz @Variety Oh he will and I'm here for it
@RealityTVBliss @Variety Truth!! He's not the fun living guy anymore. He's lost friends. I hope he finds his way back!
@RemiVz @Variety So have his fans. Ever since he started w that vampire his films are odd or too serious Where's the guy who loves #JackAss?
@RealityTVBliss @Variety Yes. And I bet he regrets that (except for the children) everyday. He's paid a high price for that mistake.
@RemiVz @Variety Yep you're right.  He's at fault for thinking with his privates
@RealityTVBliss @Variety I agree. She needed a guy & a one that is beloved would be better for her very poor image.  Brad fit the bill.
@RemiVz @Variety I don't think she ever really loved him. After she was dumped she needed a quick replacement to adopt kids
@RealityTVBliss @Variety Preach!! She sang his praises til she didn't need him. Or so she thought. She has shown us here who she really is.
@RemiVz @Variety Wow! Wow! She's backtracking now since her smear campaign blew up on her. She forgot he made her look normal
@RealityTVBliss @Variety I live in his hometown, met his family, cousin went to HS w/Brad. Town loved Jen! Ang is above us. We ♥️ Brad!
@Variety No matter how hard she tries or pays for SM push Ppl know he was the better sane half.  So over her smear campaign on him
